headline: Virgin Atlantic selects Boeing to enable high-speed, streaming quality Wi-Fi across 787 fleet
summary: Boeing [NYSE: BA] and Virgin Atlantic have agreed to implement connectivity modifications across Virgin Atlantic's fleet of Boeing 787 Dreamliners. The upgrades will enhance onboard internet service, bringing high-speed, streaming-quality Wi-Fi to passengers. The services agreement was announced at MRO Europe on Oct. 15.

headline: Is Boeing in the Crossfire Amid Intensified US-China Trade War?
summary: BA stock faces fresh turbulence as Trump's export control threat deepens U.S.-China trade tensions, putting its China deals and deliveries at risk.

raw.headline: Is Boeing in the Crossfire Amid Intensified US-China Trade War?

headline: Airbus Supplies First A350-900 Jet to Swiss International Air Lines
summary: EADSY delivers first A350-900 to SWISS, underscoring strong jet demand and expanding its long-haul aircraft footprint.

raw.headline: Airbus Supplies First A350-900 Jet to Swiss International Air Lines

headline: CyViation Collaborates With Boeing to Improve Aircraft Cybersecurity & Regulatory Readiness
summary: NEW YORK, October 15, 2025--CyViation, a cybersecurity company dedicated to aviation safety, is collaborating with Boeing Aviation Business Solutions (ABS) to support aircraft cyber risk assessments and compliance. ABS will begin offering CyViation’s SkyRay™ platform to support its clients with evidence-based solutions in their Digital and Cybersecurity consulting practice.

raw.headline: CyViation Collaborates With Boeing to Improve Aircraft Cybersecurity & Regulatory Readiness

headline: National Flag Carrier Mauritania Airlines Selects StandardAero for LEAP-1B and CFM56-7B Engine Maintenance, Repair & Overhaul Support
summary: SCOTTSDALE, Ariz., October 15, 2025--StandardAero (NYSE: SARO), a leading independent pure-play provider of aerospace engine aftermarket services, is pleased to announce that it has been selected by Mauritania Airlines, the flag carrier airline of Mauritania, to provide maintenance, repair and overhaul (MRO) support for the CFM International CFM56-7B and LEAP-1B turbofan engines powering its fleet of Boeing 737NG and Boeing 737 MAX 8 narrowbody aircraft.

headline: BAE Systems unveils expansion of avionics services and support at MRO Europe
summary: BAE Systems (LON: BA) introduced Horizon Solutions™ Aftermarket Services and Support at the MRO Europe conference today, the new name for its expanded product offerings in commercial avionics repair and support. The Horizon Solutions lineup reflects BAE Systems' commitment to innovation and growth to meet the industry's evolving demands.
